file_content.text: I demand to speak to the magistrate! The crime rate in this cesspool is--it's unacceptable!
Sorry, you lost me there. Who is it you're looking for?
The magistrate! Some hoodlums just robbed me, and I want him to do something about it!
You're a long way from Coruscant, pal. Republic's got no jurisdiction here.
You got a problem with the locals, buy yourself a blaster and deal with them yourself.
